Name: OXXO
About the game: Hey, Hamster here! I create puzzle games for you: Scalak, Zenge, PUSH or Art Of Gravity. 'OXXO' GOAL: Group similar blocks. They like each other ;) HOW TO DO THAT? -Discover the game on your own, no tutorials! -Play with the blocks. You can't loose in OXXO! -Rotate them like in no other game before. -Use all 3 Dimensions :) -Sometimes you'll have to think a bit. I designed OXXO for you to experience discovery of ever changing mechanics. Relax, enjoy the puzzles, feel good about yourself! Have fun playing, and thanks for your support! Yours Mike aka Hamster On Coke
